text: Camila Carraro Mendes is an American actress. She was born in Charlottesville, Virginia. She is known for playing Veronica Lodge on The CW teen drama series Riverdale. ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:1994 births Category:Living people Category:American movie actors Category:American television actors Category:American voice actors Category:Actors from Charlottesville, Virginia
title: Camila Mendes
